Hero.introduction: Whether you're looking to protect yourself against natural hazards, financial loss or any other unforeseen situation, our parametric insurance is here to help.

golden.highlight: Revolutionise your protection against climate risks
golden.text: with our innovative application, combining parametric insurance, decentralised blockchain and actuarial AI for a world more

MainDAO.explanation: Community members pay into a DAO they manage. An oracle automatically sets the prices and conditions for compensation.

1.text: Climate change has led to an increase in extreme weather events such as storms, floods, droughts...

2.text: Players unable to provide effective solutions. Technical obstacles, complex insurance products, loss of confidence, increased costs...

3.text: We believe that the best answers come from communities. People working together are more likely to find the right answers to the problems they face.

1.text: Change your perception and regain your confidence. Here, the money paid in remains the property of the user.

2.text: Here, you understand exactly what you're paying and what you can expect in return. You can check your available cash at any time.

MainApp.introduction: Whether you're looking to protect yourself against natural hazards, financial loss or any other unforeseen situation, our parametric insurance is here to help.

MainParadigme.title: A paradigm shift
MainParadigme.subtitle: Our mission is to give you back control

1.1: Nobody knows when they pay their insurance, or whether their premium is in line with the service provided.
1.2: No one knows whether they will really be compensated if the risk occurs.

2.1: The customer knows the probability of the risk and the amount of the premium is completely transparent.
2.2: Compensation is automatic and unrelated to the level of claims incurred
2.3: The customer pays provisions, not contributions.
